sn12.22:1.2: “Dasabalasamannagato, bhikkhave, tathagato catuhi ca vesarajjehi samannagato asabham thanam patijanati, parisasu sihanadam nadati, brahmacakkam pavatteti:
sn12.22:1.3: ‘iti rupam iti rupassa samudayo iti rupassa atthangamo,
sn12.22:1.4: iti vedana iti vedanaya samudayo iti vedanaya atthangamo,
sn12.22:1.5: iti sanna iti sannaya samudayo iti sannaya atthangamo,
sn12.22:1.6: iti sankhara iti sankharanam samudayo iti sankharanam atthangamo,
sn12.22:1.7: iti vinnanam iti vinnanassa samudayo iti vinnanassa atthangamo.
sn12.22:1.8: Iti imasmim sati idam hoti, imassuppada idam uppajjati;
sn12.22:1.9: imasmim asati idam na hoti imassa nirodha idam nirujjhati.
sn12.22:2.1: Evam svakkhato, bhikkhave, maya dhammo uttano vivato pakasito chinnapilotiko.
sn12.22:2.2: Evam svakkhate kho, bhikkhave, maya dhamme uttane vivate pakasite chinnapilotike alameva saddhapabbajitena kulaputtena viriyam arabhitum:
sn12.22:2.3: ‘kamam taco ca nharu ca atthi ca avasissatu, sarire upassussatu mamsalohitam. Yam tam purisathamena purisaviriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbam, na tam apapunitva viriyassa santhanam bhavissati’ti.
sn12.22:3.1: Dukkham, bhikkhave, kusito viharati vokinno papakehi akusalehi dhammehi, mahantanca sadattham parihapeti.
sn12.22:3.2: Araddhaviriyo ca kho, bhikkhave, sukham viharati pavivitto papakehi akusalehi dhammehi, mahantanca sadattham paripureti.
sn12.22:3.3: Na, bhikkhave, hinena aggassa patti hoti.
sn12.22:3.4: Aggena ca kho, bhikkhave, aggassa patti hoti.
sn12.22:3.6: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, viriyam arabhatha appattassa pattiya, anadhigatassa adhigamaya, asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
sn12.22:3.7: ‘Evam no ayam amhakam pabbajja avanjha bhavissati saphala saudraya.
sn12.22:3.8: Yesanca mayam paribhunjama civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharam tesam te kara amhesu mahapphala bhavissanti mahanisamsa’ti—
sn12.22:3.10: Attattham va hi, bhikkhave, sampassamanena alameva appamadena sampadetum;
sn12.22:3.11: parattham va hi, bhikkhave, sampassamanena alameva appamadena sampadetum;
sn12.22:3.12: ubhayattham va hi, bhikkhave, sampassamanena alameva appamadena sampadetun”ti.
